gate.plugin.learningframework

Class AbstractDocumentProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.creole.AbstractProcessingResource
          • gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
            • gate.plugin.learningframework.AbstractDocumentProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.creole.ANNIEConstants, gate.creole.ControllerAwarePR, gate.Executable, gate.LanguageAnalyser, gate.ProcessingResource, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LearningFrameworkPRBase, LF_GenFeatures_Affixes, LF_GenFeatures_Misc

    public abstract class AbstractDocumentProcessor
extends gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
implements gate.creole.ControllerAwarePR
    Abstract base class for all the PRs in this plugin. This is very similar to what the AbstractLanguageAnalyser should have been.
    See Also:

      • process

        protected abstract gate.Document process(gate.Document document)
        The new method to implement by PRs which derive from this class. This must return a document which will usually be the same object as it was passed. NOTE: in the future the better option here may be to return Optional of Document or even List of Document. That way downstream PRs could be made to not process filtered documents and to process additional generated documents.
        Parameters:
        document - the document
        Returns:
        document

      • beforeFirstDocument

        protected abstract void beforeFirstDocument(gate.Controller ctrl)
        This can be overridden in PRs and will be run once before the first document seen. This method is not called if no documents are processed at all.
        Parameters:
        ctrl - controller

      • processingStarted

        protected void processingStarted(gate.Controller ctrl)
        This can be overridden in PRs and will be run after processing has started. This will run once before any document is processed and before the method beforeFirstDocument is invoked, even if no document is being processed at all.
        Parameters:
        ctrl - the controller

      • afterLastDocument

        protected abstract void afterLastDocument(gate.Controller ctrl,
                                          Throwable t)
        Handler for processing after last document
        Parameters:
        ctrl - the controller
        t - any throwable

      • finishedNoDocument

        protected abstract void finishedNoDocument(gate.Controller ctrl,
                                           Throwable t)
        Handler for processing after finishing without any document
        Parameters:
        ctrl - the controller
        t - any throwable
